Real Name: Johnny Storm
Special Powers
WHOEVER HOLDS THE COSMIC CONTROL ROD RULES THE NEGATIVE ZONE: Leadership. Mastermind. // When Human Torch uses Leadership and succeeds, the friendly character does not have to be adjacent if it shares a keyword with him.
GET OFF MY SHIP!: KNOCKBACK. Pulse Wave. When Human Torch uses Pulse Wave, friendly characters have PROTECTED: Pulse Wave.

So just to be clear this is capital PROTECTED: Pulsewave. So your figures can't be damaged or targeted by it. Since its going to be 4 squares that is REALLY good.
